description.narrative:
Acompañando el proceso de fortalecimiento de las capacidades de ACODEA, para impulsar su crecimiento y cambio, hacia una agriagencia profesionalizada.
null
Short-term goal:
CAK is well funded, well-staffed and its governance structure is an example for all cooperatives in Kenya (and abroad), by: * Make a realistic budget for 2018. How much money is needed to CAK, to grow from its current position to a new position that makes her end 2018 ready the renewed organization and staff can fulfil the desired tasks. (e.g. number of staff members, ICT-systems, office facilities). * Calculate the needed subscription fee pro member based on the budget. * Prepare a governance structure for complying with an independent position, but members influence must be guaranteed. * An independent Supervisory Board is a prerequisite. * Realize involvement of board members, involvement of women and involvement of younger people. * These steps must be approved by Board and General Assembly as soon as possible. * Realize these steps in 2018.. Long-term perspectiveCAK becomes the most excellent and therefore unavoidable influencer in Kenya’s cooperative movement. It is the voice of the cooperatives. This should be CAK’s focus, next to organize cooperative platforms on county and regional levels.
Admin cost. The value is summarized by year
OSID / FO has systems in place, which facilitate member involvement in strategy setting and monitoring and in decisions (‘participation’)
